title: Marugoto♥Anju Gakuen
original_name: まるごと ♥ 杏樹学園
sinopse: Kaguya is a boy in an all-girl's school for demons [fox spirit, succubus, werewolf, etc]. Being the only human was bad enough, but the added risk of his manhood being discovered makes for silly and unbelievable (deliciously envious) situations. (Source: M-U)
